description: Manage your repositories, track builds, and oversee the release lifecycle seamlessly. Leverage powerful AQL queries to search for artifacts and monitor runtime clusters effectively. Enhance your JFrog platform experience with this integrated MCP server.

jfrogUrl.description: Base URL for your JFrog platform instance

capabilities.name: jfrog_check_availability
capabilities.description: Check if JFrog platform is ready and functioning or not

capabilities.name: jfrog_create_local_repository
capabilities.description: Create a new local repository in artifactroy

capabilities.name: jfrog_create_remote_repository
capabilities.description: Create a new remote repository in Artifactory to proxy external package registries

capabilities.name: jfrog_create_virtual_repository
capabilities.description: Create a new virtual repository in Artifactory that aggregates multiple repositories

capabilities.name: jfrog_set_folder_property
capabilities.description: Set properties on a folder in Artifactory, with optional recursive application

capabilities.name: jfrog_list_repositories
capabilities.description: List all repositories in Artifactory with optional filtering by type, package type, and project

capabilities.name: jfrog_list_builds
capabilities.description: return a list of all my build in the jfrog platform

capabilities.name: jfrog_get_specific_build
capabilities.description: Get details for a specific build by name, optionally scoped to a project

capabilities.name: jfrog_list_runtime_clusters
capabilities.description: return a list of all my runtime clusters in the jfrog platform

capabilities.name: jfrog_get_runtime_specific_cluster
capabilities.description: return a runtime cluster by id

capabilities.name: jfrog_list_running_images
capabilities.description: List all running container images across runtime clusters with their security and operational status

capabilities.name: jfrog_list_environments
capabilities.description: Get a list of all environments types (e.g. dev, prod, etc.) in the JFrog platform with their details

capabilities.name: jfrog_list_projects
capabilities.description: Get a list of all projects in the JFrog platform with their details

capabilities.name: jfrog_create_project
capabilities.description: Create a new project in the JFrog platform

capabilities.name: jfrog_get_specific_project
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific project in the JFrog platform

capabilities.name: jfrog_execute_aql_query
capabilities.description: Execute an Artifactory Query Language (AQL) query to search for artifacts, builds, or other entities in JFrog Artifactory. AQL is a powerful query language for searching and filtering artifacts in Artifactory repositories. It supports complex criteria, sorting, pagination, and more.

capabilities.name: jfrog_get_package_info
capabilities.description: Useful for when you need to get publicly available information about a software package. it will provide you with the following information on it, if available in public sources: a short description of the package, its latest published version, the software license this software is distributed under, along with urls of its version control system, its homepage and whether it is known to be a malicious package (in any version).

capabilities.name: jfrog_get_package_versions
capabilities.description: Useful for when you need to get a list of versions of a publicly available package. it can tell you each version's publication date. Can also filter based on version vulnerability status.

capabilities.name: jfrog_get_package_version_vulnerabilities
capabilities.description: Useful for when you need the list of known vulnerabilities affecting a specific version of an open source package.

capabilities.name: jfrog_get_vulnerability_info
capabilities.description: Useful for when you need to get a specific vulnerability information, including its affected packages and versions.

capabilities.name: jfrog_get_package_curation_status
capabilities.description: Useful for checking the curation status of a specific package version. Returns one of the following statuses: approved, blocked, inconclusive.

capabilities.name: jfrog_list_permission_targets
capabilities.description: Get a list of all permission targets in the JFrog platform

capabilities.name: jfrog_get_permission_target
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific permission target

capabilities.name: jfrog_create_permission_target
capabilities.description: Create a new permission target in the JFrog platform

capabilities.name: jfrog_update_permission_target
capabilities.description: Update an existing permission target in the JFrog platform

capabilities.name: jfrog_delete_permission_target
capabilities.description: Delete a permission target from the JFrog platform

capabilities.name: jfrog_get_permission_resource
capabilities.description: Get details of a specific resource type within a permission target

capabilities.name: jfrog_update_permission_resource
capabilities.description: Update a specific resource type within a permission target

capabilities.name: jfrog_replace_permission_resource
capabilities.description: Replace a specific resource type within a permission target

capabilities.name: jfrog_delete_permission_resource
capabilities.description: Delete a specific resource type from a permission target

capabilities.name: jfrog_get_artifacts_summary
capabilities.description: Get the summary of artifacts, one or many
